summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2844 for the improvement of the easterly side of Third Avenue Northwest, from West Sixtieth Street to West Sixty-second Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, together with all cross- walks, providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 34384, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
